page.title: 09Daily Life -A schoolchild
page.content: At 7.30a.m. I wake and then rouse my Mum. We go downstairs and I have my breakfast of Farmhouse Bran, honey and nuts, and a piece of toast with Marmite.I have a wash, brush my teeth and hair, and then get dressed in my jeans and jumper.I pack my bag and walk to school. At 9 o'clock the teacher rings the bell and we go into school and hang our bags and coats on our pegs.Our teacher calls the register,and after saying our prayers we write a story until playtime at 10.30.On rainy days we stay inside and play cards or snakes and ladders, but when it is fine we play outside.When the bell rings I go to the toilet, wash my hands and go to lessons. We eat our lunch at 12 o'clock.I bring sandwiches from home and eat them after we have said grace.
